name: Hell of Blazing Fires
declaringWar: I have just received a report that large numbers of my troops have crossed your borders.
attacked: Pitiful fool! Now we shall destroy you!
defeated: Now the question is who will protect my people. A dark age has come.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
unique: [+33]% Production when constructing Atomic Bomb and Nuclear Missile [in all cities]
